skills.skill: Compliance with IRS and State Regulations

duties_responsibilities.duty: Process bi-weekly/ multi state payroll for approximately 1500 employees, including new hires, terminations, status changes, and changes to employee data.
Ensure accuracy of compensation payments, awards, bonuses, and gross-up calculations.
Capture/process hours from timekeeping system and import into payroll system.
Review hourly employee timecards and process off cycle payments as needed.
Maintain and verify accuracy of employees’ FTO balances and reconcile payroll taxes on a bi-weekly, quarterly, and annual basis.
Assist with Year End tasks ensuring the accuracy of W2’s and prepare W-2c forms as needed.
Maintain and create procedure documentation, and generate payroll reports as needed.
Assist on assignments/projects as needed requiring judgment and initiative.

education_certification.credential: BS in Finance, Accounting, or a related field (Masters preferred)
